caption.title: The southeast Queensland bioclimatic and substrate model (SDM3) projection of potential high probability future habitat distribution of T. robusta under IPCC A2 emission scenario (minimum threshold = 0.15).
caption.p: From left to right: ( a) under baseline climate (1990), ( b) 2030, ( c) 2050 and ( d) 2070. The currently known locations of T. robusta sites are also shown. All maps were generated in ArcGIS v10.2 24.
